channel.title: [EASYRSC] Wierd error when server loads up
channel.description:
When i start my server, after the accounts have loaded ect, I get this error..I dont know what is causing this and why, Any help will be very helpfull.
[code]Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\li b\tools.jar Buildfile: C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\allmydedishit\ServerA ndClient\Server\build.xml
runserver: [java] Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoun dsException: 1646 >= 0 [java] at java.util.Vector.elementAt(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.DefaultListModel.getElementAt(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicListUI.updateLayoutState(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicListUI.maybeUpdateLayoutState(Unk nown Source) [java] at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicListUI.getPreferredSize(Unknown S ource) [java] at javax.swing.JComponent.getPreferredSize(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.ScrollPaneLayout.layoutContainer(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.layout(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.doLayout(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.Container.validate(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.RepaintManager.validateInvalidComponents(Unknown Source) [java] at javax.swing.SystemEventQueueUtilities$ComponentWorkRequest.ru n(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown S ource) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Sour ce) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown S ource) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Thanks for looking.

item.title: [EASYRSC] Wierd error when server loads up
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:4, topic:331049”][quote]
Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\li
b\tools.jar[/quote]
tools.jar contains javac

Copy it from your JDK lib folder to your JRE lib folder.[/quote]
Thats not causing my problem, Its been like that ever since i started working on my source, Never gave the other errors though, I just did what u said and get the same error just without tools.jar line ect.

Read full topic
item.source: [EASYRSC] Wierd error when server loads up

item.title: [EASYRSC] Wierd error when server loads up
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\li b\tools.jar
tools.jar contains javac

Copy it from your JDK lib folder to your JRE lib folder.

Read full topic

item.title: [EASYRSC] Wierd error when server loads up
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

darscape:

What source is this from? Regular easyrsc or noobscape?

Hmm, noobscape with lots deleted, and 2 things from noobscape v3, it worked fine untill today i got this error, i have no idea why, All i changed today was some npcs shit, there all correct and that could’nt be the problem here.
